2025-06-17.content: Support for the [PHP 8.4 runtime](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/flexible/php/runtime) is in [General Availability (GA)](https://cloud.google.com/products/#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: PHP 8.4 Runtime Now Available
summary.summary: We are pleased to announce that PHP 8.4 is now generally available for the App Engine flexible environment. This update provides the latest features and improvements for your PHP applications.
